搗.definition: to pound; to beat; to hull; to attack; to disturb; to stir

搗亂.definition: to disturb; to look for trouble; to stir up a row; to bother sb intentionally

搗實.definition: to ram (earth); to compact earth by ramming

搗弄.definition: to move back and forward; to trade

搗爛.definition: to mash; to beat to a pulp

搗碎.definition: to pound into pieces; to mash

搗蛋.definition: to cause trouble; to stir up trouble

搗鬼.definition: to play tricks; to cause mischief

搗鼓.definition: to fiddle with sth; to trade with sth
